h2_title: Father of Stones Boss Fight and Guide
content: Just like fights against other stone bosses, it's best to skip elemental damage and go for pure attack power in this fight. You want your attacks to be heavy and hit hard, and for your defense to be up as much as possible.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Father_of_Stones.md', within the main section titled 'Father of Stones', specifically from the subsection 'Father of Stones Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Just like fights against other stone bosses, it's best to skip elemental damage and go for pure attack power in this fight. You want your attacks to be heavy and hit hard, and for your defense to be up as much as possible.
